H0.text: Vermillion is a shade of which colour. Orange

H1.text: Vermillion is a shade of which colour. Pink

H2.text: Vermillion is a shade of which colour. Purple

H3.text: Vermillion is a shade of which colour. Red

A4.text: It is synonymous with red orange, which often takes a modern form, but is 11% brighter.

A5.text: Vermilion is not one specific hue; mercuric sulfides make a range of warm hues, from bright orange‑red to a duller reddish‑purple that resembles fresh liver.
